basic.floral_language:
Punica granatum 
Floriography: mature, beautiful, zeal
Punica granatum is the official flower of the City of Xi-an in China, very graceful. Has two types of flowers, female and male, on the same plant. Flower color orange, male flowers have narrow bottoms, bell-shape, female flowers have wider bottoms. Punica granatum is suitable for indoor decoration, also for flower and fruit viewing, very popular in the public. 
Punica granatum likes sunshine, tolerate half shade. Bloom in May to June for 2-3 weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period May-June, viewing period 2-3 weeks

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply 1-2 times monthly in spring
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, old, diseased, and dead leaves timely
